title: Behind the Scenes
overview: An 80-million robbery shakes the bank in the Republican era. Cheng Ru's father dies in the heist, and to uncover the truth behind his death, Cheng Ru becomes a nightclub singer and approaches the Chamber of Commerce president, Yan Liang. As their power struggle intensifies, their feelings for each other begin to grow. Meanwhile, Cheng Ru uncovers her fianc√© Cheng Feng's secret, and the mystery deepens.
